Projectos

Carlos Branco Gym WebPage

I have a degree in Interior and Product Design from Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias. I finished my course in 2005 and, during college, I reconciled my studies with the role of monitor of the Design, Architecture and Urbanism workshops in an after-work regime, at the same Faculty. After the course, and due to the lack of job offers in my area of ​​training, I chose to start my career in sales, having gone through different areas, from telecommunications, fine art products, optics, etc. , and currently I'm the commercial representative of the leading brand of office chairs in Portugal, Alital, S.A. However, I'm a technology lover and I always try to keep up with the sector's news, and, in 2021, I decided to bet heavily on this passion and started several online courses in Web Development and JavaScript. This site is my first project!

Anchor Stories

I have a degree in Interior and Product Design from Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias. I finished my course in 2005 and, during college, I reconciled my studies with the role of monitor of the Design, Architecture and Urbanism workshops in an after-work regime, at the same Faculty. After the course, and due to the lack of job offers in my area of ​​training, I chose to start my career in sales, having gone through different areas, from telecommunications, fine art products, optics, etc. , and currently I'm the commercial representative of the leading brand of office chairs in Portugal, Alital, S.A. However, I'm a technology lover and I always try to keep up with the sector's news, and, in 2021, I decided to bet heavily on this passion and started several online courses in Web Development and JavaScript. This site is my first project!
